summary: This code generates a unique ID using UUID library, prints an initial message along with the ID, and then iterates over each byte from stdin, printing it along with the ID.

details.comment: This code generates a unique ID using UUID library, prints an initial message along with the ID, and then iterates over each byte from stdin, printing it along with the ID.
details.content:
import sys
import uuid
uid = str(uuid.uuid4())
print("init",uid)
for x in sys.stdin.buffer:
    print([x],uid)
